channel.title: [New] Click-MMO [Game]
channel.description:
[center] [shadow=blue,left][size=24pt][font=arial][u][b]Click-MMO[/b][/u][/font][/size][/shadow] [i]I posted this project a little while back, then deleted it, but I'm working on it again.[/i] [i]It's still really early in development.[/i] I would like to find some people to play around on the game, to help me test and find problems. [url=http://click-mmo.com]click-mmo.com[/url] [/center] [b]Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Auto combat system[/li] [li]Item & equipment drops with rarity[/li] [li]Community boss monster battles[/li] [li]Player controlled guild system[/li] [li]Easy to use staff panel[/li] [li]Player market[/li] [li]Hiscores[/li] [li]Online Players list[/li] [li]Equipment upgrading[/li] [li]Player attributes[/li] [li]Energy replenishing cron[/li][/ul] [b]And more to come....[/b]
[center] [b]Media[/b] [i]News/layout[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/STFbfYV.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [i]Staff Panel Add Items[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/LDHpyT0.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [i]Item Storage[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/LxWlOjC.png[/img][/spoiler] [i]Guild Applications[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/GDkm0yb.png[/img][/spoiler] [i]Player Market[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/k9mNc7n.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [i]Hunting Map 1[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/DE7Obls.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [i]Community boss battles[/i] [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/IUs9Col.png[/img][/spoiler] [/center] And that should do it for now!

item.title: [New] Click-MMO [Game]
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

They are pretty easy to find from monsters, you can heal from the Inn, and you gain 5 per minute online so, buying pot’s is unnecessary in my opinion.

Read full topic

It’s fun if I was able to buy pots

item.title: [New] Click-MMO [Game]
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

[center]

[shadow=blue,left][size=24pt][font=arial]Click-MMO[/font][/size][/shadow]

I posted this project a little while back, then deleted it, but I’m working on it again.
It’s still really early in development.

I would like to find some people to play around on the game, to help me test and find problems.
click-mmo.com
[/center]

Features:

[ul][li]Auto combat system[/li] [li]Item & equipment drops with rarity[/li] [li]Community boss monster battles[/li] [li]Player controlled guild system[/li] [li]Easy to use staff panel[/li] [li]Player market[/li] [li]Hiscores[/li] [li]Online Players list[/li] [li]Equipment upgrading[/li] [li]Player attributes[/li] [li]Energy replenishing cron[/li][/ul]

And more to come…

[center]
Media

News/layout
[spoiler][/spoiler]

Staff Panel Add Items
[spoiler][/spoiler]

Item Storage
[spoiler][/spoiler]

Guild Applications
[spoiler][/spoiler]

Player Market
[spoiler][/spoiler]

Hunting Map 1
[spoiler][/spoiler]

Community boss battles
[spoiler][/spoiler]
[/center]

And that should do it for now!
